title: Jesse & Joy: What We Never Said Before
overview: In this intimate docuseries, siblings Jesse and Joy Huerta open their hearts like never before, sharing the secrets, wounds, and challenges that shaped both their personal lives and their artistic journey. From their childhood under the strong influence of their father, who was a pastor, to moments of crisis, reconciliation, and creativity, the series offers a revealing look at how music became their path to healing.  Across four episodes, the series features never-before-seen testimonies from the artists themselves, their family, friends, and collaborators, with behind-the-scenes footage from their tour El Despecho Tour and the making of their album Lo que nos faltó decir (What We Didn’t Get to Say).
